0.question: Pam has 11 bracelets. Sue has 3 fewer bracelets than Pam. How many bracelets does Sue have?

1.question: Jason had 7 books. His grandfather gave him 5 more. How many books did Jason have then?

2.question: Jeremy has 14 pencils. 6 of them are broken. How many pencils are not broken?

3.question: Stuart and Andrew have 17 comic books altogether. 10 of them belong to Stuart. How many comic books does Andrew have?

4.question: Lynn caught 7 butterflies. Robin caught 4 more butterflies than Lynn. How many butterflies did Robin catch?
